comparison.instructions: Select two castings for dual-view comparison. The template will be displayed in neutral colors, while the comparison will highlight critical wear areas in bright red for immediate identification.
comparison.criticalWarningDesc: Red areas indicate severe thickness reduction requiring immediate inspection and potential replacement.

view.controls: Use mouse to rotate â€¢ Scroll to zoom
view.controls1: Drag to rotate, scroll to zoom

repair.title: REPAIR PROPOSAL
repair.noAreas: No areas requiring repair with current parameters

gunite.title: GUNITE PROPOSAL VISUALIZATION
gunite.description: Shows 3D visualization of repair areas and material requirements

analysis.zones: Zones: Roof, SlagLine, Belly, InitialBricks, Bottom
analysis.instructions: Click grid cells or points to view thickness across all files

warning.noPoints: No points are available for the selected screen "{{screen}}".
warning.cause1: Missing or mismatched "section" data in the CSV file.
warning.cause2: No points match the current furnace selection.
warning.cause3: Thickness data may not align with the wear threshold.
warning.suggestion: Please check the file "{{file}}" or adjust the settings.

lidar.noDataMessage: No data available. Please select a file with LiDAR data.
lidar.selectFolder: Select a folder to load LiDAR data

thickness.title: Furnace Lining Thickness

thickness.possibleCauses: Possible causes: Incorrect data format or missing data in CSV files.
